abstract: In hindsight, former Walt Disney chief executive Michael Eisner calls his decision in 1995 to buy CapCities/ABC, and with it, its crown jewel ESPN, ”one of the best acquisitions maybe of that whole century,” The Associated Press writes.
snippet: In hindsight, former Walt Disney chief executive Michael Eisner calls his decision in 1995 to buy CapCities/ABC, and with it, its crown jewel ESPN, ”one of the best acquisitions maybe of that whole century,” The Associated Press writes.
lead_paragraph: In hindsight, former Walt Disney chief executive Michael Eisner calls his decision in 1995 to buy CapCities/ABC, and with it, its crown jewel ESPN, ”one of the best acquisitions maybe of that whole century,” The Associated Press writes.

headline.main: Eisner on ABC 15 Years Later: Still Worth It
